Text:
STFmaryvilee....thanks a great deal for the Alejandro Jodorosky link. Sadly, a major part of the comics are in Spanish. I really appreciate your efforts.

I particularly love your collections,.... Black Panther, Green Arrow. Dont have the bandwidth yet, but they are awesome collectibles. Thanks

you're welcome soletar. yeah, not very much of Jodorosky's work has been translated to english. hopefully more of it will be.

thanks for the compliments about my comic torrents. i'm glad that you enjoy them.
